title: Font ID please, modern sans
content:
You guys are geniuses for sure, do you know what this is? also a short list of typefaces with this type of "a" ie a more oval/circular lower part, unlike the typical helvetica "a" that points back up towards the top "tail"

Many thanks

Tom
